values: think up [phrasal verb]think up (something) or think (something) up informal: to use your mind to form or invent (something)想出Quick! We have to think up an excuse.快点！我们得想出个借口。They thought up a new way of raising money for charity.他们想出一个为慈善事业筹集资金的新方法。 think
